attributes.action: make telford and wrekin council accountable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Senior Management and Labour Councillors have consistantly let down the Electorate of Telford and Wrekin.

They have constantly put themselves first and the residents of the borough do not even appear as a priority.

We as residents need openness, honessty, effective consultation and an investigation into

-Transforming Telford
-The City Region
-The real reasons for building in the Town Park
-Why they can make efficiency savings to their projects.
-Why the vending machine at Wellington pool only makes £1 profit.
 
and many other topics.

We want accountability, openness and honesty NOW.
